summary: White dress for girls and black and white *tux*
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana]
[heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
White dress for gurls and black and white *tux* for guys. No more \"i now pronounce u mr and mrs santa claus\" weddings lol :)

Ingame item is \"wedding dress\"
Console cheat:
player.additem 00088956 1

[heading]UPDATE HISTORY[/heading]
Update 1.1 : Improved dress colouration

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data\\
